reviewText:
Discover the role that math plays in the design, technology, and construction of modern skyscrapers, as it did in ancient Greek architecture. See how geometric shapes -- triangles, quadrilaterals, circles, and polygons -- have helped shape structures found the world over.
Math and the Greeks
Triangles
Quadrilaterals
Circles
Polygons

Grade Level 9 - 12 Runtime 56  2005
